content: Foxes can grow up to six feet if they tried harder.
Everything you read on the internet is true.
Without their shells, turtles would float away like balloons.
Cats are just dogs that have been diagnosed with psychopathy.
Cows love to go on dates.
Vampires are one of the only creatures on Earth to shed their uterine lining monthly.
Just like humans, pigeons vomit into their partner's mouth when horny.
The Roman Empire collapsed over ten years ago.
There are more than eight species on Earth.
Planes can only fly because they truly believe they're actually birds.
The Bitterroot Plant is bitter because it doesn't appear on the Montana state flag.
Grizzly bears are probably very cuddly, someone just needs to check.
The Western Meadowlark is so named for commonly engaging in showdowns at high noon.
Remote Italian villages import Ponderosa pine cones and stomp them to make fine wines.
The Common Huckleberry's self-esteem takes a huge hit every time it is called "common."
The Northern Pike only swims north and was the inspiration for Dr. Seuss's Zaxes.
The Black Footed Ferret's feet are not naturally black; they just like to play in the mud.
No Rocky Mountain Cutthroat Trout has ever lost a game of poker.
